mapper.select: SELECT m.id,m.password,m.nickname,m.address,m.phone,m.email,m.name,m.age,m.remove_user_date,m.profile, a.sns,a.account,a.artist_info,TO_CHAR(a.check_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as checkDate FROM os_member m, os_artist a WHERE m.id = a.id(+) AND m.id=#{value}
SELECT auth_name,id FROM os_auth WHERE id=#{value}
SELECT check_date FROM os_artist WHERE id=#{value}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM os_member WHERE nickname=#{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE os_member SET password =#{password} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select m.nickname,m.profile,f.following_id from(select row_number() over(order by id asc) as rnum,following_id,id from os_follow where id=#{id} ) f,os_member m where m.id=f.following_id and m.remove_user_date is null and rnum between #{pagingbean.startRowNumber} and #{pagingbean.endRowNumber}
SELECT id,round(sum(show_like/2)/count(show_no),1) as avglike FROM os_show GROUP BY id HAVING id=#{value}
